body:
Comment 1: 
From the documentation of strings.Title

"Title returns a copy of the string s with all Unicode letters that begin words mapped
to their title case."

So e is capitalised to E, the remained of the word is untouched. 

Something like this might work, http://play.golang.org/p/W4xQnHXa4n
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
